mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart_items (user_id, product_variant_id, quantity, created_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{productVariantId}, #{quantity}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT c.id AS cart_item_id, c.quantity, p.id AS product_id, p.name AS product_name, p.price AS product_price, p.image_url AS product_image, pv.id AS product_variant_id, pv.color AS variant_color, pv.size AS variant_size, pv.stock FROM cart_items c LEFT JOIN product_variants pv ON c.product_variant_id = pv.id LEFT JOIN products p ON p.id = pv.product_id WHERE c.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cart_items WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE cart_items SET quantity=#{quantity} WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND id = #{id}
